yaqj~ja(gm) SRuqNOtu# dEqvaH sa#viqtA hava#M mE | 
dEvI#rApO apAM napAqdya Uqrmir.ha#viqShya# indriqyAvA$n-maqdinta#mastaM dEqvEByO# dEvaqtrA dha#tta Suqkra(gm) Su#kraqpEByOq yEShA$M BAqgaH stha svAhAq kAr.Shi#raqsyapAq&pAM mRuqddhra(gm) sa#muqdrasyaq vO&kShi#tyAq unna#yE || 
yama#gnE pRuqthsu martyaqmAvOq vAjE#Shuq yaM juqnAH | 
sa yantAq SaSva#tIqriSha#H || 23 
(nu - saqptaca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A13)
